snippet.title: LAYTON’S MYSTERY JOURNEY: Katrielle and the Millionaires’ Conspiracy- Deluxe Edition: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the enhanced puzzle-solving adventure with new puzzles, new outfits, and remastered graphics in LAYTON’S MYSTERY JOURNEY: Katrielle and the Millionaires’ Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition, available now for Nintendo Switch!

Learn more here! http://bit.ly/2ZnhduI

#LaytonsMysteryJourney #NintendoSwitch #Nintendo
Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
